rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Some native creatures are rampaging up on the north coast,
and apparently an Arms team got injured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
So it became a matter of
eliminating those native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0003
rows.name:
While we were prepping for that, a mission from Commander Vandham
came flying in, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's tough, right?
Being relied on so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0005
rows.name: That sounds tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Understood.
We'll take the mission from Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0007
rows.name: Thank you, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0008
rows.name:
About that mission,
please look at this footage from the Valley of Oblivion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Long-range footage...
Is that a spaceship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
There's nothing for comparison, so the size
is hard to judge, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Looks like it's being attacked one-sidedly[ST:wide ]â€•[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0012
rows.name: Tatsu's heart of justice burns, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0013
rows.name: Everyone, let's go help them out, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0014
rows.name: Don't get fired up with a sense of justice you expect others to act on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
It's blurry so I can't be sure, but
the attackers look like Growth weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0016
rows.name: It resembles the units we fought before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
That's right. So the mission is to go to the location
and confirm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Whether it's an unknown alien spacecraft or not
"the enemy of our enemy is our friend," as they say[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0019
rows.name: The old man Vandham said so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0020
rows.name: I agree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0021
rows.name:
As long as we're living on this planet,
it's better to have more friendly neighbors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0022
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I understand the situation.
Leave the rest to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05040100_MSG0024
rows.name: Please do.[ST:wait ]
